name: places/ChIJ296O84tZwokRY4mg8e2LslQ
formattedAddress: 225 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I paid $20k for blinds and curtains in June and it's late October and I'm still waiting for items to be installed.  When they initially came to install, there were items missing from the order. The second time, it was to install some of the missing items and remount the original blinds, which for some strange reason they had placed right next to the windows that opened inward, which meant we were unable to open the windows.  The third time they came, it was to install the specialised tracks, which had taken their time to arrive.  The fourth time they came, it was to re-measure for the specialised tracks because the original ones were the wrong size, and one of the curtains was also the wrong length.

We all know mistakes happen, but this is beyond a joke.  And what makes it worse, is that their 'customer care' never responds to emails and they haven't even offered me any sort of compensation for the inconvenience.  I had just moved into a new place, so I've had three months of paper blinds on my bedroom windows while I wait for my curtains.  My advice, avoid at all costs, as it's how companies behave when things go wrong that define them, and this company has failed on all counts in this instance.

At the time of writing, I have not heard back regarding the replacement curtain and tracks, which is 3 weeks after they came to measure them.  I have since being on the BBB site and have come to realise that my experience is not unique.

Update:  It's now January and the specialised tracks are still not installed.  That's seven months since I paid for them and 6 months since they were supposed to be installed.  I believe the appropriate term for this company is incompetent.

originalText.text:
Mariah provided excellent customer service over the phone while selecting my products.  The Shade Store was also speedy at turning around our buildings COI in less than 24 hours. Lastly the install was a smooth and quick process.

We are very happy with the final product

We are very happy with the final product

originalText.text: Placed a pretty big order during quarantine, and worked with Mariah Yirka-Folsom. She was super efficient, friendly and very helpful every step of the way. The installation went smoothly, and the shades look really amazing. I will be back for sure in the future. Thank you!

text.text: Placed a pretty big order during quarantine, and worked with Mariah Yirka-Folsom. She was super efficient, friendly and very helpful every step of the way. The installation went smoothly, and the shades look really amazing. I will be back for sure in the future. Thank you!

originalText.text:
I placed an order for a cellular shade from The Shade Store. They sent someone to my home to take measurements and place the order. My shade arrived within several weeks. As soon as the shipping notice was emailed , I received another email with days and times for installation.
Everything was done meticulously and completely stress free with no mess.
I highly recommend The Shade Store - above and beyond my expectations!

originalText.text: Worst service. They were good when i bought the honeycomb. After some years I had a problem and decided to just replace the shade. Now I have two shades with problems. So decided to repair it. Sam from Horizon on 24th st didnt even ask what the problem was. He kept saying this was 11 years old and Hunter Douglas wouldnt repair it. Im quite sure its a restringing problem but he didnt care to even look at it. Its an expensive shade and I dont want to just throw it in the garbage. Stay away from Horizon at all cost. I will.
